info.full_description:
Art‚ÄΩ üé®üì∏‚úèÔ∏èüé•üñ•Ô∏èüïπÔ∏èüñºÔ∏èüé∂üí°üí¨‚ÄîArtists creating, illustrating, sketching, singing, musically inclined, photographing, sculpture, discussing & daily living too.
Mastodon.art ‚Äî a place for your artwork of all types from visual, musical, peformance or ____. Also, fun banter, commentary & cited fair-use posts/art/reviews of others' art too. Replace your twitter, tumblr & Facebook! Welcome to y(our) free & open source decentralized life. Mastodon.art doesn't monetize or profit off of your personal information‚Äîyour information is never for sale. Export & leave for another instance anytime. No Brand, name or famous trademark squatting. Zero tolerance for harrassment or bullying ‚Äî your account will be deleted. No Porn, No Loli, Artistic Form, No Bots & Respect Others
info.topic: Art, Music, Photography, Sculpture, Discussion & Generalistic too.

info.short_description: A Mastodon instance for the University of Twente community.
info.full_description:
A Mastodon instance for the University of Twente community.
Membership is restricted to students, alumni and employees of the University of Twente.
Content posted on this instance does not reflect the opinions or policies of the University of Twente.

info.short_description: Maly is a stable, non-tracking Mastodon instance running along other services like our PeerTube instance and a private cloud.
info.full_description:
Hello ! My name is Tijl Van den Brugghen, named KindlyFire online. I run this Mastodon instance and some other public services for anybody to enjoy. I detailed most information on this page, but feel free to ask me anything !

# Guarantees

* We do not track you. (but others on the Fediverse might, no instance can guarantee this)
* Light moderation. The instance rules are defined below.
* We federate with every instance out there. But that does not say we allow every kind of content.

# Rules

Obviously, every instance has to have rules. Without this, although this instance is pretty small, there would be problems. Here they are:

* Respect everyone
* Do not spam (this applies mainly to bots)
* No NSFW without an appropriete Content-Warning.
* Any kind of illigal content is prohibited.
* Have fun üéâ

More information is available on our about page: https://maly.io/about/more
Just the right place for you

info.short_description: ieji.de is useable via .onion, fast and well secured plus ES and CDN!
info.full_description:
ieji.de is powered by a powerful dedicated server, has a good 1Gbps DE-CIX uplink, DDoS protection, best possible TLS settings without locking too much out(like Android) and a Tor onion link if you need a bit anonymity.

We are a liberal instance based in Frankfurt. Blocking other instances only on really harsh misbehaviour. And instance whitelisting is a no go.

Feel free to join, you can always delete your account.

Elasticsearch is enabled

Minio CDN is enabled

We expect that everybody respects values shared by our Basic Text when s¬∑he speaks on our instance : https://pirateparty.be/basic-text/

Nous nous attendons √† ce que chacun¬∑e respecte les valeurs v√©hicul√©es par notre Texte de Base lorsqu'iel s'exprime sur notre instance : https://fr.pirateparty.be/texte-de-base/

We verwachten dat hij/zij die op onze instantie spreekt de waarden gedeeld door onze Basistekst, respecteert : https://nl.pirateparty.be/basistekst/

info.short_description: A new Mastodon for nice people based in the Netherlands. Open for everyone as long as you act nice.
info.full_description:
Welcome!
Tired of the major social networks and their awfull practices? Mastodon might be for you. I have started this local instance of Mastodon to try it out with my friends. But of course, their friends or random strangers are all welcome, as long as they are nice people and behave like nice people! :)

Welkom!
Ben je de gangbare sociale netwerken en haar walgelijke praktijken zat? Mastodon kan dan iets voor je zijn. Ik ben met deze installatie van Mastodon begonnen om het eens te proberen met mijn vrienden. Uiteraard is een ieder welkom, als je maar 'nice' bent en je je dus een beetje normaal weet te gedragen :).

LOVE!

info.short_description: Une fois pour TOOT ! A Mastodon in Brussels.
info.full_description:
Petites Singularit√©s vous invite, en direct de Bruxelles, √† l'√©veil d'un mastodonte... Live from Brussels! Live vanuit Brussel!

This instance is provided by Petites Singularit√©s ASBL for like-minded people in Brussels and elsewhere. P.S.: works with free software and grassroots activists across disciplines, ranging from agro-ecology to cartography, libre aesthetics & ethics, (self-)organization & policy.

Mastodon instance for the Dutch community, but open to anyone. Primary languages Dutch and English.
Mastodon instance for the Nederlandse gemeenschap, maar open voor iedereen. Voertaal voornamelijk Nederlands en Engels.

dutchxs is a general instance, everyone is welcome.
